description.value: You can selectively stop your bleeding with ease. Reduce the DC of flat checks to stop @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Persistent Damage]{Persistent Bleed Damage} you have from 15 to 10, and you can use a single action that has the concentrate trait to gain an early flat check without physically binding the wounds. You recover naturally from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Drained]{Drained} condition twice as quickly as normal.
